product_name: Aquaglide Deschutes One HB Inflatable Kayak
long_description: A high-quality inflatable with a rigid bottom for great times on flatwater, the Aquaglide Deschutes(TM) One HB Kayak offers room for a solo paddler and plenty of gear. 8 ft. length and wide outline provide comfort, stability and enough room for day-tripping gear. Rigid floor offers stability and paddling performance that rivals the performance of hard-shell kayaks. Splash guards positioned fore and aft of the cockpit help keep paddler drier in rough waters. Seat features adjustable air cushions, high backrest, plentiful mesh storage pockets, integrated fishing-rod holder and adjustable seat straps. Kayak features a tough PVC construction and a polyester covering that stands up to on-the-water use and resists degradation from UV light. High-performance fin system includes a stiff, foiled fin with a quick-release system. The Aquaglide Deschutes One HB Inflatable Kayak includes a storage bag and weighs 36 lbs. Please note, this kayak requires a high-pressure pump to bring the HB floors to the correct pressure, pump sold separately.
short_description: A high-quality inflatable with a rigid bottom for great times on flatwater, the Aquaglide Deschutes(TM) One HB Kayak offers room for a solo paddler and plenty of gear.
